project.objective:
The scope of the topic is to design, develop; test and flight qualify a high speed / high voltage direct current (HVDC) generator system with an integral motor function to be installed onto the Next Generation Civil Tilt Rotor.
The Denis Ferranti Group addresses this scope making use of its technical strengths in design, manufacture and testing set against a firm financial footing and unique intellectual property in relation to the topic. Denis Ferranti has TRL 4 technology at 4kW/kg achieving demanding safety objectives and exceeding the topic performance requirements.
project.title: High Speed HVDC Generator / Motor
